header.sub-title: WishShare - Your wishlist in the cloud
header.title: Sign up now and get started for free
header.text: Share your wishes with friends and family - Keep track of the gifts you've given - Easy and clear

signup.title: Share your wishes quickly and easily
signup.text: WishShare is your personal wishlist in the cloud. It gives you an overview of your wishes and makes it easy to share them with family and friends

form.title: Sign up
form.name: Name
form.password-error: Password must be at least 6 characters long!

card-1.title: Wishlist
card-1.text: Create your wishes quickly and easily. Share with friends and family. Option to copy both wishes and wishlists.

card-2.title: Wish overview
card-2.text: You know the feeling. It's Christmas and there are many wishlists and gifts to keep track of. With the wish overview you always have control of the gifts.

card-3.title: Wish splitter
card-3.text: You're going to a party and the host wants an expensive gift that's out of your budget. No problem. In WishShare you can split the wish.
